duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the Synchronised Supply Chain Program Team for the Global Operations Network.
Accountable for the development & deployment of Global Supply Network Planning (SNP) process standards & metrics.
Deliver the program scope to enable Ops 2025 Synchronised Supply Chain business capability.
Report into the Program Steering Committee (Operating Committee) and collaborate with Global Operations cross-functions.
Facilitate the communication of Transformation program remit, scope, charter and program landmarks to Senior Operations Leaders, SLT, Regional SC leadership & Commercial customers.
Oversee both the development and implementation of Planning business systems.
Facilitate the coordination of change plans and ensure they are fully understood by the operational planning community.
Work with HR community at Global & Site levels to ensure role definitions, skill matrix, and competency maps for new roles are aligned.
Hold accountability for Program budget & PMO delivery achievements.
Ensure linkage of program objectives with foundational planning excellence capabilities for E2E Supply Chain Process value realization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Operations Management, or a related field (Master's preferred)
